items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Cute n comfy
items.body: Great quality material. Fits great. It has a little bit of stretch to it. Definitely will keep you warm. Read more
items.author: JayRo550

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars very versatile
items.body: I ordered this sweater dress for the holidays and was really happy with how it fits and feels. It has a regular fit that hugs nicely without being tight, and the turtleneck and mini length give it a flattering, festive look. I found it true to size, but if you’re between sizes, sizing up would give a more relaxed fit. The cable-knit fabric feels soft and comfortable against the skin, and it’s warm without feeling heavy. It worked well both indoors and outside on cooler evenings. The red-and-white snowflake pattern is classic Christmas without looking over-the-top, and the ribbed cuffs and knit texture make it look more polished than a typical holiday sweater. It’s very versatile—I wore it with boots for a holiday party, but it would also look great layered under a coat for everyday winter wear. I could easily see this being a nice Christmas gift as well. So far, it’s held up well. I washed it gently and laid it flat to dry, and it kept its shape nicely. Overall, a cozy, flattering dress that feels festive but still comfortable. It's a great value for the money! Read more
items.author: Breakpoint Tech

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Runs large
items.body: Very cute, high quality. Runs large Read more
items.author: Mom of 4 boys

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars So happy to add this dress to my wardrobe.
items.body: This is a very comfortable and stylish dress! The fabric is soft and warm, not at all itchy like some sweater dresses I've worn. It's perfect to wear while out and about with leggings and boots or just worn around the house as a comfortable pajama dress. The turtle neck collar around the neck isn't too tight or restrictive and the hem falls far enough down that you could wear this sans leggings. The print is very cute (NOT an ugly sweater dress) and I'm very happy to add this to my winter wardrobe. I have a hard time finding sweater dresses that are flattering and comfortable and this dress certainly is. I'm 5'8, 170 lbs. and ordered an XL, which fits perfectly. I have a long torso and struggle finding short dresses that aren't just long shirts on me, and most I have to wear legging under because the just aren't long enough to cover my bum. This dress I can actually wear as a dress, and while it is short it still covers everything. I'm very happy with this dress, indeed. It is a wonderfully thick knit, not sheer anywhere and fully covers. At the price of $49.99 at time of order, I think this price is comparable to other sweater dresses of this quality, which is high. Read more
items.author: Reviewer 24601

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Cute and comfy
items.body: This sweater dress is very comfortable while also being super cute and stylish. I ordered my usual sizing and it fits true to size. The turtle neck feels nice and isn't restrictive or uncomfortable. The fabric is good quality and isn't itchy or irritating. I also find this dress is really flattering and hugs in the right places, especially on a curvier figure. The coloring is beautiful and looks just as pictured. I washed in cool water and dried on a low setting and didn't have any issues with shrinking or fraying. It's also quite warm, especially if worn with tights or leggings. Overall, this is a very cute dress that's also comfortable and I'm really happy with it. Read more
items.author: Brit

items.title: 1.0 out of 5 stars Picture lied
items.body: I brought this dress for a outing when I tried it on it fit me as a shirt not dress I picked my size XL. Dress was very short I will have to wear as a sweater Read more
items.author: shanika mcintosh

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Cozy comfort meets festive flair
items.body: This black Christmas sweater dress is a soft warm polyester with no snags or flaws. The black base with seasonal accents makes it stylish yet versatile. It has a comfortable fit and holiday ready, my wife is excited to wear it for her upcoming Christmas event. Read more
items.author: delite916

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great gifts
items.body: Got this for a coworker for Christmas. It's the perfect gift! The fabric is very decent. There are no loose threads. The color are exactly where it should be. The package comes air tight sealed. Read more
items.author: Gc

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

This piece transitions well from daytime plans to evening events with a quick change of shoes and a small bag or clutch.

For the best look, smooth the fabric, check the neckline placement, and pair it with shoes that match the occasion and the hem length.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Light Green, Black, B-red, Green, A-red. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.
